description: Bad Guys 2 continues to build excitement among fans with its blend of humour, stylish action, and polished storytelling. The movie’s streaming availability on major platforms increases its reach, while the returning cast and engaging heist-based plot help generate positive buzz across social media and review sites.
title: Bad Guys 2 Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know About DreamWorks’ Funniest Heist Crew

description: Cristina Kathirvelan, now available on aha Tamil, is a feel-good romantic drama with humour and emotional twists. With an IMDb score of 7.8, the film explores how a mistaken marriage certificate disrupts lives and reveals heartfelt truths. A charming, warm watch for romance and family-drama lovers.
title: Cristina Kathirvelan Begins Streaming on Aha Tamil: A Heartwarming Tale of Love and Mistaken Identity

description: Dracula: A Love Tale has captured strong viewer interest with its emotional retelling of the vampire myth. Highlighting themes of eternal love, heartbreak, and identity, the film presents Dracula in a more human, vulnerable form.
title: Dracula: A Love Tale Now Available for Rent on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know

description: Astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope have detected unexpected ultraviolet radiation around five young protostars in the Ophiuchus molecular cloud. Since infant stars are not expected to emit UV light, the finding challenges long-standing star-formation models. Researchers ruled out external illumination from nearby stars, concluding the UV must originate within the protostars themselves. Future JWST observations may reveal how these forming stars generate such high-energy radiation.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Finds Unexpected Ultraviolet Radiation Around Young Protostars

description: Scientists have spotted an unusual gravitational-wave signal that may reveal the universe’s first primordial black holes—tiny relics dating back to the Big Bang. Recorded by LIGO–Virgo–KAGRA in November 2025, the event involves an object far lighter than any known stellar remnant. If verified, it could reshape theories of black holes and dark matter.
title: New Gravitational-Wave Signal May Reveal Primordial Black Holes Born After the Big Bang

description: Dhurandhar, with a stellar cast of Akshaye Khanna, Sanjay Dutt, R Madhavan, Arjun Rampal and others, is all set for its theatrical release on December 5. The movie will stream online on the OTT platform Netflix from January, according to reports. The film will be released in two parts, featuring high-stakes undercover operations. As of now, there is no IMDb rating available.
title: Ranveer Singh-Starrer Dhurandhar OTT Release Date Reportedly Out: Everything You Need to Know

description: New modelling suggests the Southern Ocean could one day release the vast heat it has stored from greenhouse gas pollution. If CO₂ levels were pushed to net-negative, deep convection may trigger a sudden “thermal burp” that warms the planet for decades. Though idealised, the study shows how Antarctica’s surrounding seas could shape long-term climate outcomes.
title: Scientists Warn Southern Ocean Could ‘Burp’ Stored Heat, Delaying Global Cooling for 100 Years

description: Rashmika Mandanna leads The Girlfriend, a powerful romantic drama premiering on Netflix on December 5, 2025. With an IMDb rating of 8.2/10, the film explores obsession, emotional abuse, and a woman’s journey to self-worth. Directed by Rahul Ravindran, the movie is available in five languages and has earned praise for its sensitive storytelling and compelling performances.
title: The Girlfriend OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Rashmika Mandanna Starrer Online?

description: Kuttram Purindhavan: The Guilty One is a thriller series that follows the emotional and moral breakdown of a man caught in a web of lies after trying to help a troubled family. Streaming on Sony LIV from December 5, 2025, the show delivers suspense, strong performances, and layered storytelling.
title: Kuttram Purindhavan OTT Release Date Confirmed: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Here are the five best smartphones priced under Rs. 10,000 that deliver an impressive gaming performance. The list includes models like iQOO Z10x 5G, Vivo T4x 5G, Realme P3 Lite 5G, Redmi Note 14 SE 5G, and Poco M7 Plus 5G. Most of them were launched this year and run on MediaTek and Snapdragon chipsets.
title: Best Gaming Smartphones Under Rs. 15,000 in India: iQOO Z10x 5G, Vivo T4x and More

description: Redmi 15C 5G is scheduled to launch in India in the first week of December. While the pricing details of the handset remain under wraps, the Chinese smartphone maker has revealed various key specifications and features of the upcoming Redmi 15C 5G. It is confirmed to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6000 chipset, paired with a 6,000mAh battery. The company claims that the phone will offer “multiple-day usage”. It will also be equipped with a 6.9-inch display, delivering up to a 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Redmi 15C 5G Key Specifications Confirmed; Will Launch in Three Colour Options

description: Samsung’s upcoming One UI 8.5 update may introduce an automatic tool to block apps that send frequent ad notifications. Spotted by a tipster, the feature appears in Device Care as “Block apps with excessive ads” and can place spam-heavy apps into deep sleep. Users may choose between Basic and Intelligent blocking, with the latter analysing notifications on-device. Expected to debut with the Galaxy S26 series, One UI 8.5 will likely enter its beta phase soon and bring several UI and usability improvements.
title: Samsung's One UI 8.5 Update Will Reportedly Add Feature to Block Apps With 'Excessive Ads'

description: Google’s Gemini 3 Pro was reportedly jailbroken by a group of researchers recently. As per the report, the researchers were able to break into the Gemini 3-powered artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot within five minutes, and were able to make it generate harmful and potentially dangerous outputs. The demonstration reveals several security flaws in the chatbot’s system, and in the wrong hands, it could lead to concerning consequences.
title: Google’s Gemini 3 Reportedly Jailbroken in Minutes, Generates Ways to Create Smallpox Virus

description: WhatsApp accounts are frequent targets for hacking, leading to risks like impersonation, data misuse and financial fraud. Attackers often use OTP scams and social engineering, meaning even careful users can be affected. Fortunately, most accounts can be recovered if you act quickly. This guide explains how to recognise a compromised account, regain access using verification tools and secure your number afterwards. It also highlights essential settings, including two-step verification and device checks, to help protect your WhatsApp account from future attacks.
title: How to Recover a Hacked WhatsApp Account: Step-by-Step Guide and Security Tips

description: IDFC First Bank account holders need a registered mobile number to conveniently check their balance online via internet banking, mobile banking, missed call banking, or WhatsApp banking. These methods usually come in handy when you are unable to visit the nearest branch or an ATM. However, it is to be noted that you do need a stable internet connection for checking the same through the mobile app, the bank’s website, and WhatsApp. If you are checking your IDFC First Bank account balance via missed call banking, you need to be in the network coverage area.
title: IDFC First Bank Balance Check Number: How to Check IDFC First Account Balance Online Using Different Methods

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is likely to go official early next year alongside the Galaxy S26 and Galaxy S26+. Ahead of the formal reveal, leaks have surfaced on the Web showcasing what are alleged to be the wallpapers for the Galaxy S26 Ultra. They suggest six wallpapers. Samsung is likely to use these shades for the Galaxy S26 trio.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Wallpaper Leak Hints at Possible Colour Options

description: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025 will end in a few hours. Hence, if you were unable to buy a new smart TV, home appliance, or kitchen appliance that you needed to purchase over the weekend, you might want to do it now. Other electronics, like gaming consoles, smartphones, smartwatches, tablets, laptops, PCs, smart glasses, and projectors, are also available at relatively low prices till the sale event is live in India. Apart from the price cuts, you can also get an instant discount of 10 percent on select credit and debit cards.
title: Amazon Black Friday Sale Ends Tonight: Best Deals on Smart TVs, Home Appliances, Kitchen Appliances, and More

description: Amazon’s 2025 Black Friday Sale is ending soon, offering major discounts on smartphones, audio products, accessories and other electronics in India. Shoppers can find reduced prices across premium and budget categories, along with additional savings through bank offers, exchange deals and coupons. The sale includes options ranging from daily-use phones to ANC earbuds and fast-charging gear. With only a few hours left and stock likely to run out, buyers have a final chance to grab these limited-time deals.
title: Amazon Black Friday Sale Ends Tonight: Best Deals on Mobiles, Accessories, and Earphones

description: India’s telecom market saw a slight rise in wireless users in October, as per the latest TRAI data. Reliance Jio led growth once again with 1.997 million new additions. BSNL also reported gains, adding 0.269 million subscribers. Vodafone Idea, meanwhile, continued to struggle, losing 0.2083 million users during the month.
title: BSNL Gains 2 Million Users While Vi Loses 3 Million Subscribers in October, TRAI Data Reveals

description: The Ministry of telecommunications has reportedly asked smartphone makers to pre-install the Sanchar Saathi app on new devices. As per the report, the notice was sent to mobile brands operating in the country on November 28, highlighting that users should not be able to uninstall or disable the app. The government’s cybersecurity app allows users to report suspected fraud calls and SMS, block stolen phones, as well as several other awareness-based features.
title: Govt Urges Smartphone Makers to Preload Sanchar Saathi App on New Devices: Report

description: Netflix has updated its support page to let users know that the platform’s mobile app will no longer support casting to newer Chromecast devices and Google TV Streamer. Some users have already noted that the Cast icon in the app has been removed. The company maintains that Google Cast and older Chromecast devices are currently supported.
title: Netflix Is Removing Casting Support From Its Mobile App to Smart TVs and Streaming Devices

description: A new GTA 6 leak has surfaced that shows alleged in-development footage from the game. The leak reportedly surfaced as part of a demo reel of a former Rockstar Games employee. The leaked video allegedly shows character animations from GTA 6.
title: New GTA 6 Leak Allegedly Shows In-Development Footage From Game

description: Vivo S50 Pro Mini reportedly surfaced on the Geekbench website with model number V2527A. The smartphone has scored 2,778 points in single-core testing and 9,344 points on multi-core testing on Geekbench. The listing suggests 16GB RAM and Android 16 OS. It is powered by an octa-core chipset with an ARMv8 architecture.
title: Vivo S50 Pro Mini Key Specifications, Performance Details Listed on Geekbench

description: Gustakh Ishq has generated consistent buzz across social media, thanks to its emotional scenes, memorable dialogues, and striking chemistry between the leads. Viewers online frequently discuss plot theories, character arcs, and upcoming twists, helping the show gain strong digital visibility.
title: Gustakh Ishq OTT Release Reportedly Revealed Online: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The docuseries has sparked intense online conversations, with viewers discussing new angles, shocking revelations, and the bold decision to feature direct interviews from key figures in the case. Social media reactions highlight its honest approach, investigative depth, and sensitive handling of a tragic event
title: Nithari: Truth, Lies & Murder Now Streaming Online: Plot, Cast, Crew, Streaming Details, and More

description: The Nothing OS 4.0 update has started rolling out to Phone 3a and Phone 3a Pro models. The Android 16-based UI brings new design elements and features. It has a new AI usage dashboard and Extra Dark Mode. The Glyph Progress now integrates with Android 16’s Live Update notifications. The Nothing OS 4.0 allows users to hide apps directly from the home screen and app drawer.
title: Nothing Phone 3a, Phone 3a Pro Get Nothing OS 4.0 Update With Android 16, AI Usage Dashboard and More

description: ChatGPT turned three last week, marking an evolution from a text-only novelty to a multimodal AI platform used across industries. It grew quickly and hit major milestones with GPT-4, a freemium model, and by integrating real-time search. The ongoing year also brought agentic tools and advanced models like GPT-5.1 to the platform, expanding ChatGPT from a chatbot into a broad ecosystem for consumers, enterprises and developers.
title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Completes Three Years Since Launch: Five Things to Know

description: The show has generated strong buzz online, with audiences praising its realistic theme and relatable mother–daughter bond. Discussions on social platforms revolve around its social message, powerful characters, and Parth Samthaan’s impactful presence.
title: Seher Hone Ko Hai OTT Release: Cast, Plot, Trailer, Storyline, and Complete Drama Summary

description: Vivo V70 series will include a Fan Edition model, according to a report. Dubbed Vivo V70 FE, the handset is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon chipset. It might ship with OriginOS 6, which is based on Android 16. However, the tech firm has yet to confirm the launch of the Vivo V70 lineup. Recently, the standard Vivo V70 was reportedly spotted on the Geekbench benchmarking platform with an octa core Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, Android 16, and 8GB of RAM.
title: Vivo V70 FE India Launch Timeline Leaked; Said to Debut With Snapdragon Chipset

description: The Vivo X300 Ultra is expected to launch in China in the first quarter of 2026, according to a tipster. This would place its debut slightly earlier than the X200 Ultra’s April launch but still within a reasonable window, as the Vivo X300 and X300 Pro were introduced this October. The tipster also claims the X300 Ultra may feature a significantly larger 7,000mAh battery, up from the X200 Ultra’s 6,000mAh unit, and larger than the batteries in the existing X300 models.
title: Vivo X300 Ultra Launch Timeline Leaked; Tipped to Arrive With 7,000mAh Battery

description: Bitcoin slipped toward $85,000 (roughly Rs. 76.1 lakh) after a liquidation cluster below $90,000 (roughly Rs. 80.5 lakh) triggered a sharp move lower. The decline pushed BTC near the $87,000 (roughly Rs. 77.8 lakh) zone, where it is attempting to stabilise. Altcoins also weakened, with Solana, XRP, BNB and Dogecoin trading lower. Analysts say the broader backdrop remains sensitive as markets adjust to the Fed ending Quantitative Tightening.
title: Bitcoin Price Slips to $85,000 Zone After Liquidation Shock; Crypto Market Eyes US Fed Shift

description: The Oakley Meta Glasses are now available for purchase in India, following their global debut in June. The AI-powered smart glasses have been developed in collaboration with the sports performance equipment manufacturer Oakley. They are offered in the HSTN style of Oakley glasses and combine Meta's AI technology stack, including support for the Meta AI assistant that enables hands-free operation.
title: Oakley Meta Glasses With Meta AI Integration Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Availability

description: OnePlus Ace 6T, which is set to be the latest addition to the smartphone maker's Ace 6 lineup in China, will feature a 50-megapixel main rear camera, the company has announced. Moreover, the tech firm has revealed that the phone will ship with Android 16-based ColorOS 16, introducing various AI-enabled tools. The phone will be launched in China on December 3 with an 8,300mAh battery and Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset. It will be available in three colourways.
title: OnePlus Ace 6T Camera Details Revealed: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Capcom is reportedly working on a Dead Rising sequel starring photographer Frank West. According to an MP1st report, the new Dead Rising game will be set in Hollywood. The project has reportedly been in development since 2023.
title: Capcom Reportedly Working on New Dead Rising Game With Frank West as Protagonist

description: iPhone 17e is said to feature Dynamic Island, marking a notable design upgrade over iPhone 16e. It is said to go official in the first half of 2026, with a 6.1-inch display with a 60Hz refresh rate. It will reportedly house a single rear camera and could run on Apple's A19 chip. It could cost around CNY 4,499 (roughly Rs. 57,000), similar to the iPhone 16e.
title: iPhone 17e Tipped to Resemble iPhone 17 With Dynamic Island; Specifications Leaked

description: The OnePlus Pad Go 2 is scheduled to go official in India and global markets on December 17. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the upcoming tablet has been spotted on a certification website. The listing not only confirms the tablet’s existence but also sheds light on several of its specifications. The OnePlus Pad Go 2 is listed as running on OxygenOS 16, based on Android 16. It is said to come with Bluetooth and Wi-Fi 6.
title: OnePlus Pad Go 2 Reportedly Bags FCC Certification Ahead of December 17 Launch

description: The India variant of the Realme Watch 5 will launch on December 4 with a 1.97-inch AMOLED display, an IP68 rating and four colour options. As per the company, it will offer up to 20 days of battery life in Light Mode, 108 sports modes, and independent GPS with five satellite systems. Health features include heart rate, SpO2, stress, sleep and menstrual tracking. The smartwatch will also support Bluetooth calling, Bluetooth intercom, NFC smart card scanning, a built-in compass and Game Guardian Mode.
title: Realme Watch 5 Key Features, Colourways Confirmed Ahead of December 4 India Launch

description: Redmi Note 16 Pro+ and Realme 16 Pro+ might be launched in China with 200-megapixel rear cameras, according to a tipster. Both handsets are said to be currently under testing. The two Chinese smartphone makers are yet to confirm the launches of their respective Pro+ model handsets. This comes shortly after a report highlighted that the Realme 16 Pro+ could be launched in India soon in four RAM and storage configurations and three colour options.
title: Redmi Note 16 Pro+, Realme 16 Pro+ Tipped to Launch Soon With 200-Megapixel Rear Cameras

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra will be launched by the Chinese smartphone maker later this month, according to a tipster. This comes shortly after the camera kit, along with the camera configuration, of the rumoured handset leaked online. Apart from the launch timeline, the leaker has also shared some more information about the Xiaomi 17 Ultra’s rear camera module. However, the tech firm has yet to confirm the launch of the handset. Earlier leaks suggest that it could be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Launch Timeline Tipped; Could Feature Upgraded Leica-Tuned Rear Cameras

description: The Lava Play Max is an upcoming smartphone teased to join the Lava Play series in India. It may feature a dual rear camera setup with a 50-megapixel main sensor, a glowing camera module design, flat plastic frames, and a larger 6.72-inch full-HD+ 120Hz display. Expected to launch in December under Rs. 12,000, it could come with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset, 6GB or 8GB RAM, UFS 3.1 storage, Android 15, and a vapour chamber.
title: Lava Play Max India Launch Teased; Tipster Leaks Price Range, Key Features

description: Realme P4x 5G is all set to be launched in India later this week. Ahead of the official announcement, pricing details of the handset have leaked online. As per the latest leak, it will be available in three RAM and storage configurations. The Realme P4x 5G will be equipped with the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra chipset and a 7,000mAh battery. It will have a 50-megapixel rear camera unit.
title: Realme P4x 5G Price in India Leaked Ahead of Launch on December 4

description: The iQOO 15 will go on sale in India starting today, December 1. The smartphone launched in the country on November 26, after first being introduced in China in October. It is equipped with Qualcomm’s latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor and is available with up to 16GB of RAM. The handset features a 6.85-inch Samsung M14 AMOLED screen with a refresh rate of up to 144Hz. It houses a 7,000mAh battery and supports 100W wired fast charging.
title: iQOO 15 With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chip to Go on Sale in India Today: See Price, Offers

description: The DoT has issued a new directive that will impact users who access messaging apps across multiple devices. Under the updated rule, instant messaging platforms are required to enable SIM-based login verification. This means services such as WhatsApp, Telegram, and Signal must ensure that users have the same active SIM used during account registration inserted in the device while accessing the app. The mandate is being introduced to prevent misuse, reduce online fraud, and strengthen digital security.
title: The End of Anonymous WhatsApp? What the SIM-Binding Rule Means for User Privacy in India

description: Google Pay remains one of the most popular choices because of its clean and simple UI, integration with UPI, and automatic bill reminders. Features like multi-bank support and detailed transaction history enhance the convenience factor. Paying your electricity, water, or DTH bill using Google Pay is a simple and secure process. Here’s how to do it.
title: How to Pay Electricity, Water, and DTH Bills on Google Pay: Step-by-Step Guide
